transcript: I'll never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? I mean all I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

segments.text: I'll never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? I mean all I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  I mean, all I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.
